title: I Think It's Garbage
report: Bought some of this inexpensive 'herbal alternative' and smoked 3 huge bowls out of a waterpipe. If it had been some quantity of another illegal herb, I would have smoked enough to lose my mind. Smells bad, Very harsh and absolutely NO effect. A perfect waste of cash.

erowid.citation: Anonymous. "I Think It's Garbage: experience with Lactuca spp. (ID 44860)". Erowid.org. May 28, 2006. erowid.org/exp/44860
